detail_desc: Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a print motif and a matching helmet. The costume has a stand-up collar with a padded edge, zip down the front and elasticated hems. The helmet has a hook and loop fastening at the front.

Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a print motif and a matching helmet. The costume has a stand-up collar with a padded edge, zip down the front and elasticated hems. The helmet has a hook and loop fastening at the front.
